instruction: List three benefits that yoga has on physical health.
output:
1. Improves flexibility and posture: Regularly practicing yoga can help strengthen the muscles, increase flexibility, and improve posture.
2. Supports injury prevention and recovery: Yoga can help strengthen weak muscles around injured areas, improve joint stability, and improve recovery time.
3. Improves circulation: Practicing yoga poses can help increase blood flow throughout the body, improving the circulatory system.
